pages.text: One may strengthen their altar with proper foci placed upon it's surface.$(br2)Torches, candles and candelabras may gather energy. A good candelabra must be created from a base of three iron bars, with an attuned stone in the center. Place 3 candles atop the base.

pages.title: Empowering Altars
pages.text: Skulls of creatures will focus power. Skeleton, wither skeleton or human shall be good.$(br2)A chalice serves to be filled with power. Craft with two gold bars, four chunks of gold and an attuned stone. Fill with a soup derived from redstone to strengthen.
